TI 74xx series

7400

library ieee; use ieee.std_logic_1164.all; entity x7400 is port (a1, b1, a2, b2, a3, b3, a4, b4: in std_logic; y1, y2, y3, y4: out std_logic); end entity; architecture behavior of x7400 is begin y1 <= not (a1 and b1); y2 <= not (a2 and b2); y3 <= not (a3 and b3); y4 <= not (a4 and b4); end architecture;

7483

library ieee; use ieee.std_logic_1164.all; use ieee.numeric_std.all; entity x74283 is port( c0: in std_logic; c4: out std_logic; a, b: in unsigned(3 downto 0); s: out unsigned(3 downto 0)); end entity; architecture behavior of x74283 is signal tmp: unsigned(5 downto 0); begin tmp <= ('0' & a & '1') + ('0' & b & c0); s <= tmp(4 downto 1); c4 <= tmp(5); end architecture;
